name: Impale
description: Stabs to the vitals inflicting instant damage and causing your target to bleed for 50-50 + 50% Weapon Damage until the target is either fully healed or they drop below a certain health threshold. Effects scale with Pips spent. 1 Pip: 55-82 and Bleed until under 90% Health. 2 Pips: 110-164 and Bleed until under 80% Health. 3 Pips: 165-246 and Bleed until under 70% Health. 4 Pips: 220-328 and Bleed until under 60% Health. 5 Pips: 275-410 and Bleed until under 50% Health.
